code: import'../App.css';import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TicketList=()=>{const[tickets,setTickets]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTickets=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3000/Tickets/getAllTickets',{headers:{'Accept':'application/json'}});const data=await response.json();setTickets(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching tickets:',error);}};fetchTickets();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Ticket List"}),tickets.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No tickets available."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tickets.map(ticket=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["User ID: ",ticket.user]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Category: ",ticket.category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Sub Category: ",ticket.subcategory]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",ticket.Status]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Description: ",ticket.description]})]},ticket._id))})]});};export default TicketList;
